column3:
utACK b7d95037f42adb393881cea182814f9a8fc14879.
Looks good, haven't tested though (currently no access to 10.13).

There is some whitespace issue:
https://travis-ci.org/bitcoin/bitcoin/jobs/350402801

Gah, still seems there's a whitespace issue.
```
diff --git a/depends/patches/qt/fix-cocoahelpers-macos.patch b/depends/patches/qt/fix-cocoahelpers-macos.patch
@@ -0,0 +1,70 @@
+
+
+
+
+
^---- failure generated from contrib/devtools/lint-whitespace.sh
```

I think we should exclude `.patch` files from the whitespace checks?
Added a backport of https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/12442 so that Travis stops harassing us about patch whitespace on the 0.16 branch.
